meanings.definition: Beyond the realm of the physical.
meanings.sent1: The idea of ghosts is superphysical.
meanings.sent2: Some people believe in superphysical beings like angels.
meanings.sent3: The superphysical presence of a ghost at the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her superphysical beauty was captivating, like a painting come to life.
meanings.sent5: The superphysical energy in the room was palpable, sending shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: Existing or occurring beyond the physical world.
meanings.sent1: The concept of heaven is superphysical.
meanings.sent2: Mystics often speak of superphysical dimensions beyond our understanding.
meanings.sent3: The superphysical nature of dreams can be both fascinating and puzzling.
meanings.sent4: His superphysical strength seemed to defy the laws of physics.
meanings.sent5: The superphysical connection between the twins was uncanny, almost telepathic.
